mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM address WHERE mno=#{mno} AND addr_type = #{addr_type}
SELECT mno, addr_type, addr_no, addr_name, address1, address2, address3 FROM carto.address WHERE mno = #{mno} ORDER BY addr_type ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO carto.address (mno, addr_type, addr_name, address1, address2, address3) VALUES (#{mno}, #{addr_type}, #{addr_name}, #{address1}, #{address2}, #{address3})
mapper.update: UPDATE carto.address SET addr_name = #{addr_name}, address1 = #{address1}, address2 = #{address2}, address3 = #{address3} where mno = #{mno} and addr_type = #{addr_type} ORDER BY addr_regdate ASC limit 1
